title: ARURF+ 9.5 Extension & Changelist
body:
Hello everyone. With ARURF+ sticking around for another 4 weeks, we decided to do some additional balance changes and adjustments to make sure the mode is as fun as possible. Below you can find the full list of changes, as well as JUST what’s new to 9.5.
=========================================================================
**FULL CHANGE LIST - CHAMPIONS**
Aatrox : +20% damage & -20% damage taken 
Ahri: -8% damage 
Akali: +15% damage & -10% damage taken
Alistar: +5% damage & -10% damage taken
Anivia: +15% damage, Passive CD set to 60 sec
Alistar: W stun expires as soon as target lands.
Aurelion Sol: +10% damage & -10% damage taken, Stars increased to 4/5/6
Azir: Capped at 3 soldiers, and W CD changed to 4.8/4.4/4/3.6/3.2 sec
Bard: +20% damage & -10% damage taken, Chimes for upgrade set to 2 and CD set to 6sec
Brand: Q stun duration reduced to 1 sec.
Braum: +10% damage & -25% damage taken
Camille: +10% damage & -10% damage taken
Corki: +10% damage, Passive CD is 8 minutes initial and 60 sec after use
Darius: +10% damage & -10% damage taken 
Elise: +10% damage & -10% damage taken
Evelynn: +20% damage 
Fizz: -5% damage
Gangplank: +15% damage 
Garen: -10% damage 
Gnar: +10% damage & -10% damage taken 
Hecarim: E CD now starts when ability ends
Heimerdinger: -5% damage
Illaoi: +5% damage & -15% damage taken
Irelia: +5% damage & -10% damage taken
Ivern: +10% damage & -15% damage taken
Janna: Q base CD set to 4.8 sec at all ranks.
Jayce: -5% damage
Jhin: +20% damage
KaiSa: -5% damage
Kalista: +20% damage
Karthus: -15% damage
Katarina: +15% damage & -10% damage taken
Kassadin: Riftwalk max stacks is 2.
LeBlanc: +10% damage
Leona: +5% damage & -10% damage taken
Malzahar: -8% damage
Maokai: Limited to 5 saplings
Master Yi: -5% damage & +5% damage taken, Q CD starts when ability ends.
Mordekaiser: Shield gain reduced by 25%
Morgana: -8% damage
Nocturne: -5% damage
Ornn: +10% damage & -25% damage taken
Quinn: +15% damage
Rammus: +10% damage & -10% damage taken
RekSai: +5% damage  & -20% damage taken
Rumble: -10% damage, Not silenced while overheated but doesn't have danger zone bonuses.
Shaco: Limited to 6 boxes
Shen: E CD begins when the move is complete or interrupted.
Sion: +10% damage & -15% damage taken 
Sivir: -8% damage 
Sona: Global CD fixed at 0.5sec, Passive damage halved, W shield is 50% as effective and only 60% CDR.
Syndra: -5% damage
Tahm Kench: +20% damage & -25% damage taken, Q only gains 60% CDR
Taliyah: +15% damage
Teemo: Limited to 12 mushrooms
Thresh: +10% damage & -10% damage taken, gains 3 souls per pickup
Udyr: +10% damage & -15% damage taken
Urgot: +15% damage & -10% damage taken 
Vladimir: -8% damage
WuKong: -5% damage
Xayah: -5% damage
Yasuo: +15% damage & -10% damage taken 
Zac: -15% damage taken, Passive CD set to 60 sec
Zed: -10% damage
Zilean: +20% damage, Q base CD set to 3.6/3.3/3/2.7/2.4 sec and stun duration reduced by 0.6sec.
Zoe: +10% damage

**FULL CHANGE LIST - RUNES**
Dark Harvest CD - 12 seconds (from 45) & Damage per soul to 2 (from 5) & Base damage to 15-55 (from 20-60) & AP Ratio to 0.1 (from 0.15)
Electrocute CD - 10 seconds (from 25)
Predator CD - 80-50 seconds (from 150-100)
Ghost Poro CD - 25 seconds (from 60)
Taste of Blood CD - 10 seconds (from 20)
Kleptomancy - Adjusted probabilities to match game time
Magical Footwear - Granted at 6 minutes (from 10)
Biscuit Delivery - Granted every 1.5 minutes (from 3)
Minion Dematerializer CD - 2 min (from 4)
Perfect Timing - Initial CD 4 minutes (from 10)
Aftershock CD - 15 seconds (from 35)
Grasp of the  Undying - Gives 15/9 HP (from 5/3)
Demolish CD - 30 seconds (from 45)
Conditioning - Starts at 6 minutes (from 10)
Phase Rush CD - 10 seconds (from 15)
Nimbus Cloak CD - 30 seconds (from 60)
Nullifying Orb CD - 30 seconds (from 60)
Gathering Storm - Gain stats every 4.5 minutes (from 10)

**FULL OTHER SYSTEM CHANGES**
Elder Dragon Buff:
Burns for 90 true damage over 3 seconds.
Bonus damage to towers is 50% as effective.
Empowered Elder Dragon Buff (2 stacks):
Burns for 210 true damage over 3 seconds. 
Empowered Elder Dragon Buff (3 stacks):
Burns for 270 true damage over 3 seconds. 
Early Surrender - Can 5 person surrender at 8 minutes or 4 person at 10 minutes.
Early Homeguard - Homeguard is enabled from the start of the match.
Bonus Tower Damage - All champs do increased damage to towers.
Teleport Disabled - You can no longer pick this summoner spell.

==============================================================================
**NEW TO PATCH 9.5 - Champs**
Aatrox : (Increase of +5% damage)
Ahri: (Decrease of -3% damage)
Akali: +15% damage & -10% damage taken
Alistar: +5% damage & -10% damage taken
Anivia: +15% damage
Aurelion Sol: (Increase of +5% damage)
Bard: (Increase of +5% damage)
Braum: (Increase of -5% damage taken)
Camille: +10% damage & -10% damage taken
Darius: (Increase of +5% damage)
Elise: +10% damage & -10% damage taken
Evelynn: (Increase of +10% damage)
Fizz: -5% damage
Gangplank: (Increase of +5% damage)
Garen: (Decrease of -5% damage)
Gnar: (Increase of +5% damage) 
Heimerdinger: -5% damage
Ivern: +10% damage & -15% damage taken
Jayce: -5% damage
Jhin: +20% damage
Katarina: +15% damage & -10% damage taken
LeBlanc: +10% damage
Morgana: -8% damage
Nocturne: -5% damage
Quinn: +15% damage
Sion: (Increase of +10% damage)
Sivir: (Decrease of -3% damage)
Sona: (Removed the -5% damage)
Syndra: -5% damage
Tahm Kench: (Increase of -5% damage taken)
Taliyah: +15% damage
Thresh: (Increase of +5% damage & -5% damage taken)
Udyr: +10% damage & -15% damage taken
Urgot: (Increase of +10% damage)
Vladimir: -8% damage
Yasuo: (Increase of +5% damage & -5% damage taken)
Zac: (Increase of -5% damage taken)
Zilean: (Increase of +10% damage)
Zoe: +10% damage

**NEW TO PATCH 9.5 - Systems**
Elder Dragon Buff: Burns for 45 + (24per dragon) true damage over 3 seconds. -> 30 + (15per dragon)
Empowered Elder Dragon Buff: Burns for 135 + (15per dragon) true damage over 3 seconds. -> 90 + (15per dragon)

replies.body: I got to say I find it funny right now the amount of work you are doing to AURF is probably more than what you have given Twisted Treeline in three years

> [{quoted}](name=TimelessLuck,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=8Zw41Eu0,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-05T16:07:32.153+0000)
>
> I got to say I find it funny right now the amount of work you are doing to AURF is probably more than what you have given Twisted Treeline in three years

https://media.tenor.com/images/b88aaec19e0ceb4ca47c859f410f6908/tenor.png

I logged in just to upvote this comment. 

Literally if we had some balance changes like these for the outliers, the whole map would be INFINITELY better. 

C’mon riot.
Same here, logged in just to upvote. They also need a balance pass at ARAM like this.
I love Twisted Treeline, but it's been completely left to rot, with no attention for map-focused balancing or even specific inclusion in missions for ages. Makes me sad.

> [{quoted}](name=Redesignated,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=8Zw41Eu0,comment-id=00060007,timestamp=2019-03-05T19:06:55.969+0000)
>
> I love Twisted Treeline, but it's been completely left to rot, with no attention for map-focused balancing or even specific inclusion in missions for ages. Makes me sad.

Seriously it's sad. They're balance changing a temporary gamemode while completely ignoring the only other map that has a ranked queue. Funnel comp has been dominating high elo for years now with no substantial nerfs.

> [{quoted}](name=TimelessLuck,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=8Zw41Eu0,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-05T16:07:32.153+0000)
>
> I got to say I find it funny right now the amount of work you are doing to AURF is probably more than what you have given Twisted Treeline in three years

I'd wager there would likely be similar amounts of ARURF+ games played this past month than twisted treeline games during the past 3 years...

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

That tends to happen when a map/gamemode is completely abandoned except for "oh yeah a bug" now and then. It's literally the same with what happened to dominion. 

Riot: no one plays this
Players: Because you never balanced or supported it
Riot: Yeah well we are deleting it cause no one plays it
Player: Are you daft?
To be fair the amount of players also surpass that of TT in three years :^)
That's because they've barely touched the mode balance wise in those 3 years.
or because arurf is significantly much more fun than TT
To be fair, it's a lot easier checking the data from this mode and just adding or subtracting overall damage done/taken from a champion.  Twisted Treeline has def been super neglected though.
They could do the exact same thing to TT. It's not an elegant solution, but it would be better than nothing.
Logging in to upvote as well !

At least they did make a couple of changes recently. 

Well... the Smite bug was finally removed. That might be about it, come to think of it. 

[There's still the rest of that that could use some tweaking.](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/spbBNcTP-the-issues-of-flex-twisted-treeline)

>
> I got to say I find it funny right now the amount of work you are doing to AURF is probably more than what you have given Twisted Treeline in three years

Logged ut to upvote aswell. 

Biggest change since lunch was when? 2014? When the turrets and jubgle camps were changed?
Cant recall any thing since that
Logged in and commented for first time ever just to upvote this
The Sad part is that he isnt wrong {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I just logged in like the other guy just to upvote this comment, its sad.
Sadly this is so true.

pls no
noooooo
also could u consider bringing ascension back?

I miss Ascension (and old dominion) so much :(

More mods in general, I expected that there would be more rotating modes in like last 2-3 years...

Not many choices for players who don't like summoners rift...
Logged on to upvote this. I want Ascension back so bad, one of the best games modes.

If at the end you are balancing the  OP champions in ar urf, at least give us back the option of selecting champions because  what is the use of balancing some champions if you can not even get them because of the randomness of the system but this time with the increased ban system? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

It's honestly a little sad that Riot is spending all this time balancing URF and they won't give Twisted Treeline a single days worth of attention.. We've been complaining about funnel comp being way too strong on this map for years. URF is a temporary gamemode while Twisted Treeline has a Ranked queue.
"Full change list" that doesn't include any of the ability changes? :P
Or stat changes.

.... but why?

The only thing you needed to do was remove the Uber Dragon and Baron. That's it. 

This is an entire waste of time. We don't need each individual champion to be "balanced" in URF mode. That's kind of the entire point, is the absurdity and nonsense of it.

I think, why AURF - why is it still random, when most heroes are repeated in the next match. Why can it not be something else, for example you can choose one character and then you have to take another one. Character, which we played get blocked until we play the rest of the characters we have in the pot.

Wait didn't the League Community demands URF be a permanent game mode? Now I see the longest run of URF with "balance changes" and how does the community respond. Cry that Twisted Treeline isn't fun... Are you ppl serious?

It's more like people are confused why a gamemode that wasn't supposed to be gone is being extended and balanced while a permanent one isn't and hasn't been for years. 

You clearly missed the point.

First off, the League community *didn't* demand URF be a permanent mode. Only part of the community wanted URF to be permanent. A different part argued that URF shouldn't be permanent.

In this particular case, people (generally) aren't complaining about ARURF getting attention, but that Twisted Treeline *isn't* getting attention. They're pointing out that a temporary game mode has gotten more balance changes in a month or two than a permanent game mode, especially one with a ranked queue, has gotten in several years. Additionally, this topic seems to be the most appropriate place to make this argument, as Mortdog is the current Lead Designer of the Modes Team, which presumably is in charge of all maps that aren't Summoner's Rift.

Essentially, people aren't complaining about URF getting some love. They're wondering why TT doesn't get any. At all. Ever. Seriously, it's been years.
shame, i was hoping to see a change with the cannon to make it not as easy to instant kill a target upon their landing. feels like spawn killing and takes away from a lot of the fun of urf.
pick the location you launch to more carefully

URF isn't supposed to be balanced nor ever intended to have balance. 
Wasn't it good enough making the mode random so now games can end at champion select? 
Trying to add balance to an intentionally unbalance game mode just feels, silly.

> [{quoted}](name=Vhan8765,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=8Zw41Eu0,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-03-05T16:07:04.304+0000)
>
> URF isn't supposed to be balanced nor ever intended to have balance. 
> Wasn't it good enough making the mode random so now games can end at champion select? 
> Trying to add balance to an intentionally unbalance game mode just feels, silly.

It _is_ supposed to be balanced though. You're confusing balance with fairness. Every champion should have approximately an equal chance of winning or it just feels like shit to get 'bad' champions. However it's not supposed to feel fair when you get 1 shot by a beyblade.
We want URF not ARURF
{{champion:120}} yet this champion remains in hiding... gut this assholes damage!
Bless you Rioters. 4 more weeks of Winter? Nah. 4 More weeks of Urf! Seriously, thank you so much. This means the world to me.

I'm kind of curious what riot's opinion on transcendence as a rune practically being mandatory for most champs here - the ad/ap it gains is just insane late, but i didn't see any changes one way or the other. Additionally, Spear of Shojin is just fucking insane in some ways but seems to remain fairly consistent in the cool-down comparatively to normal, especially in regards to the reduction for items like Protobelt, gunblade, etc. 
Lastly, any input on the strength of certain items compare to others, such as Edge of Night versus Banshee's veil or Zhonyas versus Guardian angel (guess that reads as active items just generally being better than Passive items) - or plans to incorporate other items that were removed, like ZZ'rot? 
I gotta admit, ZZ'Rot seems a lot worse with the Champion Canon.

Also I am really enjoying the golden spatula club benefits - is that continuing? I forgot to check and I'm too lazy to scroll up.
Yes, if you have the Golden Spatula, it will keep working for the 4 extra weeks.
Lol. Nice. You completely ignored everyone's questions and concerns with regard to twisted treeline whilst cherry picking this person's favorable post for a your response. Nice dodge lol
That Karthus typo is bugging me more than it should....
Might wanna fix the Karthas {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
I am A-OK with these adjustments,
Karthas !
[Karthas Menethil](https://youtu.be/BCr7y4SLhck?t=15) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
